summary:
James Bond, the famous spy created by Ian Fleming, has thrilled audiences since 1953. Seven actors have portrayed Bond in 27 films, with Sean Connery being the first. The movies are made by Eon Productions, who bought the rights in 1961. The series is one of the highest-grossing film franchises, earning over $7.8 billion. It has won six Academy Awards, including Best Sound Editing and Best Original Song.

The rights to some stories were sold separately, leading to non-Eon films like *Casino Royale* (1967) and *Never Say Never Again* (1983). These films also showcase the enduring popularity of the iconic character.
title: List of James Bond films
